title: lighex
author: lighex
content: Following Ripple's legal victory against the U.S. SEC, XRP's price nearly doubled. XRP has the potential to challenge the crucial $1 level in the upcoming days. ðŸ”¥However, the current outlook suggests limited strength in sustaining its rally further.ðŸ”¥If XRP successfully breach the $1 barrier, a potential target for September could hover around $1.35

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: lighex on July 16, 2023, 05:19:04 PMFollowing Ripple's legal victory against the U.S. SEC, XRP's price nearly doubled. XRP has the potential to challenge the crucial $1 level in the upcoming days. ðŸ”¥However, the current outlook suggests limited strength in sustaining its rally further.ðŸ”¥If XRP successfully breach the $1 barrier, a potential target for September could hover around $1.35For XRP to reach 1$ is not a big task and it will reach within a few weeks or days. XRP is already trading over 0.8$.Also, note that XRP all-time high was over 3.5$ and I will not be surprised if XRP breaks its all-time high in the next bull market.Coming to the sec case, it is not only a win for XRP but for the whole crypto community. There are many coins for whom SEC declared security but now I think SEC will have to reconsider its decision.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: lighex on July 16, 2023, 05:19:04 PMFollowing Ripple's legal victory against the U.S. SEC, XRP's price nearly doubled. XRP has the potential to challenge the crucial $1 level in the upcoming days. ðŸ”¥However, the current outlook suggests limited strength in sustaining its rally further.ðŸ”¥If XRP successfully breach the $1 barrier, a potential target for September could hover around $1.35I am always surprised the way some investors analyse the market with all confidence being optimistic for things to work to there direction. Well, I don't mean XPR can not move as fast as that as you have explained but I think this is too quick for all this to happen and we are not even already in the bull market. It is very true that all this will happen but I think it's going to take some time or if the market is pumped, we might see the market doubling in price again if things works positively.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on July 19, 2023, 07:10:25 PMFor XRP to reach 1$ is not a big task and it will reach within a few weeks or days. XRP is already trading over 0.8$.Also, note that XRP all-time high was over 3.5$ and I will not be surprised if XRP breaks its all-time high in the next bull market.It seems that you are very optimistic, but the truth may be completely different. The chances of XRP reaching $3.5 seem very unrealistic.It is true that the sec case gave a moral boost to investors, as it generates more demand for the currency, given that some platforms will re-list it again, but its effect has ended, and therefore the next stage is to correct the price slightly.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: If we're just going to talk about the possibilities of it reaching $1, let's just say that it's there. But giving the percentage of how it is possible to happen, I have no idea.As long as there are news coming in for it and giving the insights in the market and how's the case did and respective updates given, there goes the exposure that it's getting from the community. But I am not optimistic with this coin anymore. Anyhow, who knows if that will be reached soon or not. Could be more or less, we will see in the bull run.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: One significant thing that the ripple coin has shown is that some other coin can bring positive vibes to the market. With the news of the court case that led to increase in the price, bitcoin also sustained it increase. Ripple is rather big for $1 range and I believe that after the court is financed, it will go beyond the ATH of $3.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: If we witness XRP reaching its all-time high, a target of $1 is not a significantly ambitious goal for XRP. Currently, XRP appears to be quite strong, and I've also made my first purchase of XRP when I heard the news because I believe that XRP can make a positive move and has potential. Just a little patience is required in XRP's case.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on July 20, 2023, 09:41:44 AMQuote from: noormcs5 on July 19, 2023, 07:10:25 PMFor XRP to reach 1$ is not a big task and it will reach within a few weeks or days. XRP is already trading over 0.8$.Also, note that XRP all-time high was over 3.5$ and I will not be surprised if XRP breaks its all-time high in the next bull market.It seems that you are very optimistic, but the truth may be completely different. The chances of XRP reaching $3.5 seem very unrealistic.It is true that the sec case gave a moral boost to investors, as it generates more demand for the currency, given that some platforms will re-list it again, but its effect has ended, and therefore the next stage is to correct the price slightly.There is nothing wrong to be optimistic and the price that we are seeing there is still realistic. XRP is really close to $1 and XRP's ATH was $3.5, so maybe it's true that it will have it again now that they already cleared their reputation. I also heard that some exchanges will list XRP again but it's not the main reason on why the demand is increasing but its because of the XRP's victory against SEC. Its effect hasn't ended yet.This isn't just a meme coin which will dump immediately right after a pump but you are right about the correction part. Each crypto has it right after they experience a significant increase. Maybe it will occur once we hit $1.

comments.author: RiverBoy
comments.body: Too much analysis give person high BP here in cryptocurrency market, just do the needful by holding and focus on another thing, while hopefully one day XRP Coin we click because of the potential ripple has and last Bull Run market Ripple did not make much move because of towards SEC court case.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: lighex on July 16, 2023, 05:19:04 PMFollowing Ripple's legal victory against the U.S. SEC, XRP's price nearly doubled. XRP has the potential to challenge the crucial $1 level in the upcoming days. ðŸ”¥However, the current outlook suggests limited strength in sustaining its rally further.ðŸ”¥If XRP successfully breach the $1 barrier, a potential target for September could hover around $1.35I think it's too early though to look for the price movement of XRP or at least a price target of $1.00. Sure it did win the case against SEC and we have seen that price went as high as 82 cents++ and I think that could be the highest price that it has reach for this cycle.So we will have to see first how everything will run. I mean after that, they hype has been gone, and almost all crypto is down. Bitcoin is below $30k as of this time. We will have next year to look though, if it will hit $1.00 then good for us. And perhaps when we start the bull run it can definitely go higher. But we don't know the time frame for that. No one can exactly predict and it's very early if you think that it can be reach this September.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: lixer on July 27, 2023, 05:02:51 PMQuote from: Husires on July 20, 2023, 09:41:44 AMQuote from: noormcs5 on July 19, 2023, 07:10:25 PMFor XRP to reach 1$ is not a big task and it will reach within a few weeks or days. XRP is already trading over 0.8$.Also, note that XRP all-time high was over 3.5$ and I will not be surprised if XRP breaks its all-time high in the next bull market.It seems that you are very optimistic, but the truth may be completely different. The chances of XRP reaching $3.5 seem very unrealistic.It is true that the sec case gave a moral boost to investors, as it generates more demand for the currency, given that some platforms will re-list it again, but its effect has ended, and therefore the next stage is to correct the price slightly.There is nothing wrong to be optimistic and the price that we are seeing there is still realistic. XRP is really close to $1 and XRP's ATH was $3.5, so maybe it's true that it will have it again now that they already cleared their reputation. I also heard that some exchanges will list XRP again but it's not the main reason on why the demand is increasing but its because of the XRP's victory against SEC. Its effect hasn't ended yet.This isn't just a meme coin which will dump immediately right after a pump but you are right about the correction part. Each crypto has it right after they experience a significant increase. Maybe it will occur once we hit $1.the $1 target price in my opinion is not hard to achieve for this coin. given that it is currently #4 in position and they partially won their battle over SEC. now, if their issue with SEC will be totally over, it can easily hit even to 2-3 bucks or more than that. but if you are a holder, you need to keep close with what's happening with their case. it will give you an upper hand whether they are heading to positive or on the other end.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Thatâ€™s an easy target for XRP and we might see its price go beyond that $1 level especially now that thereâ€™s a lot of good news from XRP. Their only issue is with SEC and we are getting a positive result already. I expect XRP to reach its peak again by next year, and its better now for us to prepare and hold more because XRP is about to rise again and those who kept on holding will get more reward from this.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: The market is slowly entering bull market and with XRP current status with SEC, i think many anticipate already that XRP can make a new ATH and that $1 can easily be break. The price level is already close to $1, the resistance is not that big and Iâ€™m sure XRP can go beyond that. The only question is that, are you prepared for a possible new ATH with XRP? It looks like SEC will settle this case and let XRP continue their business peacefully.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: XRP actually has a very good project foundation, especially this old coin that has a high market cap. even after its win from the SEC, XRP is already in the top 4 past BNB, even staying here. Actually, earning $ 1 is not difficult for XRP, which has gone through its toughest FUD period with the SEC. However, when exactly, this is still to be expected. At least, if Bitcoin is going to continue in the next month and reach a higher rate, it could be that XRP is also following it pretty well.

comments.author: Hypnosis00
comments.body: Quote from: lighex on July 16, 2023, 05:19:04 PMFollowing Ripple's legal victory against the U.S. SEC, XRP's price nearly doubled. XRP has the potential to challenge the crucial $1 level in the upcoming days. ðŸ”¥However, the current outlook suggests limited strength in sustaining its rally further.ðŸ”¥If XRP successfully breach the $1 barrier, a potential target for September could hover around $1.35For me, that was the usual price I see before and it only drops low during the bear season and it gets back to that price when the market had recover. But thinking it reaches high like other projects and turns bullish, that seems impossible and I'd never witness it. Honestly, we have nothing to expect more from the XRP price to rally high, it remains at that level below $3 no matter what we do. That is why many investors never see this as a profitable investment due to is behavior, however, I was happy to see its progress from its issue with the SEC.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Possible. But while I do think XRP winning against the SEC is a big thing, it's not enough to push it to break past its past ath. I'd say at most 1.2 and then it should fall back down after all the news has died down. I'd attribute most of the increase in price to the case after all since it is free exposure, and without that, XRP should settle down to its usual price movements below $1, that is unless something big about the XRP scene happens once again.Chances are, $1 should be rather achievable, I just don't really know when. Possibly a few months later on? The price jumped from .4 to .8 in the past couple of weeks after all so I reckon we'd see it gradually slowing down in terms of price increase.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.created_time: July 27, 2023, 10:59:12 PMLast edit: July 27, 2023, 11:13:39 PM by Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: Wexnident on July 27, 2023, 10:57:02 PMPossible. But while I do think XRP winning against the SEC is a big thing, it's not enough to push it to break past its past ath. I'd say at most 1.2 and then it should fall back down after all the news has died down. I'd attribute most of the increase in price to the case after all since it is free exposure, and without that, XRP should settle down to its usual price movements below $1, that is unless something big about the XRP scene happens once again.Chances are, $1 should be rather achievable, I just don't really know when. Possibly a few months later on? The price jumped from .4 to .8 in the past couple of weeks after all so I reckon we'd see it gradually slowing down in terms of price increase. Its still a partial win against SEC but if this one would be completely close down and considered that XRP completely win against SEC then it might really be shooting up its price to those possible prices that it hadn't been able to reach before but of course its not an assurance because everything would really be depending or basing up on community demands and recognition basing up on such condition or situation.Its really that hard to make out some conclusions specially on this very unpredictable market on which prices could really goes up and down without being expecting for it to happen.For someone who do really still believe on XRP's potential then it wont really be that bad on accumulating since we arent still on a bull run yet.Usually these fundamentals or positive news do pop out on the time that the market would really be having that bull run cycle.Trust me, those news and fundamentals would be floating everywhere when the time comes.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: gurunanakji777 on July 22, 2023, 05:16:56 PMIf we witness XRP reaching its all-time high, a target of $1 is not a significantly ambitious goal for XRP. Currently, XRP appears to be quite strong, and I've also made my first purchase of XRP when I heard the news because I believe that XRP can make a positive move and has potential. Just a little patience is required in XRP's case.honestly $1 marks isn't that massive, surely this coin could simply reach that price mark as the time goes and thats for certain.i think when the bullrun gonna come, it will affect this coin massively since we all know ever since back then this coin just stuck, only right now that it has some good bullrun that it doubles quite literally its market capitalisation that I think in the future bullruns, the effect will be tremendously enhanced with this coin.though there are many coin emerging and might overshadow this coin in general, but I guess this coin have gotten some veteran holders that willingly hold ever since it was corrected massively.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: It's just matter of time till this coin can reclaim $1 back again. XRP hype is quite big right now after the court was just ruling SEC as non security coin. I think that another problem gonna come soon as SEC is not stopping yet in battling against XRP. The only problem is how long this case gonna happen with XRP? $1 can be reached again by XRP soon.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: Quote from: aubert on July 27, 2023, 11:47:59 PMIt's just matter of time till this coin can reclaim $1 back again. XRP hype is quite big right now after the court was just ruling SEC as non security coin. I think that another problem gonna come soon as SEC is not stopping yet in battling against XRP. The only problem is how long this case gonna happen with XRP? $1 can be reached again by XRP soon. More attention is being pushed than I thought it would be soon, but it's clear the price movement in this market we need to look back on. When the news easily has a pump force of tens of % or even hundreds, but conversely if the news is not favorable, the bad news will still have to happen. And most altcoins are watching the movement of bitcoin during the current period closely, so the top price situation is a quick push and then a discharge that leaves everything as if nothing happened.Although I personally am also very supportive of the turning point of the XRP event in the crypto market, perhaps I am not a fan of FOMO so I can only judge from my point of view without wanting to embed it.
